title: Number of U.S. Pinterest users 2017 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The difference of Number of users in millions between the highest and lowest Sex is 26.3.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of users in millions 58.9 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Sex is 32.6.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The difference of Number of users in millions between the highest and lowest Sex is 26.3.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
Sex Female has 1.81 times more Number of users in millions than Sex Male which is has the lowest.
Considered together, the average Number of users in millions in all 2 Sexs is roughly 45.75.
